item.title: Droping -=HELP=-
item.dc:creator: @duhelis duhelis
item.description:
@duhelis wrote:

bluescape

its delta i think

Say whats wrong
Client.java

[code]public void dropItem(int droppedItem, int slot) {
// misc.printlnTag(“droppeditem [”+playerItems[slot]+"] which is
// ["+(droppedItem+1)+"]");
boolean a = true;

if(playerName == null)
return;
if(droppedItem == 4045 && !isInJail()){
deleteItem(4045, 1);
dealDamage(15);
hitDiff = 15;
plrText = “Ouch!”;
plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
updateRequired = true;
hitUpdateRequired = true;
setAnimation(827);
return;
}
if ((playerItemsN[slot] != 0) && (droppedItem != -1)
&& (playerItems[slot] == droppedItem + 1)) {
for (int element : noTrade) {
}
if(destroyItem(droppedItem)) {
outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(34);
outStream.writeWord(14171);
outStream.writeByte( 0);
outStream.writeWord(droppedItem + 1);
outStream.writeByte(255);
outStream.writeDWord(1);
outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord();
sendFrame126(“Are you sure you want to destroy this object?”, 14174);
sendFrame126(“Yes.”, 14175);
sendFrame126(“No.”, 141756);
sendFrame126(""+GetItemName(droppedItem), 14184);
sendFrame126(getMessageA(droppedItem),14182);
sendFrame126(getMessageB(droppedItem),14183);
sendFrame164(14170);
publicDroppendItem = droppedItem;
return;
}
ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[slot] - 1, absX, absY,
playerItemsN[slot], playerId, false);
// createGroundItem(droppedItem, absX, absY, c);
deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]);
updateRequired = true;
savegame(false);
}[/code]

Itemhandler.java

[code]public void removeItem(GroundItem item)
{
items[item.getSlot()] = null;
}

public int getItemAmount(int id, int x, int y)
{
	for (int index = 0; index < 5000; index++)
	{
		if(items[index] == null)
			continue;
		GroundItem i = items[index];
		if(i.getItemX() == x && i.getItemY() == y && i.getItemId() == id)
			return i.getItemAmount();
	}
	return 0;
}

public boolean itemExists(int id, int x, int y)
{
	for (int index = 0; index < 5000; index++)
	{
		if(items[index] == null)
			continue;
		GroundItem i = items[index];
		if(i.getItemX() == x && i.getItemY() == y && i.getItemId() == id)
			return true;
	}
	return false;
}

public void reloadGroundItems(client c)
{
	if(c == null)
		return;
	for (int index = 0; index < 5000; index++)
	{
		if(items[index] == null)
			continue;
		GroundItem i = items[index];
		//if(c.distanceToPoint(i.getItemX(), i.getItemY()) <= 60)
		if(c.playerId > 0)
		{
			if(c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("zee best"))
				c.sM("Should update items.");
			if(c.playerId == i.getItemController() && i.hideTicks > 0)
			{
				c.removeGroundItem(i.getItemX(), i.getItemY(), i.getItemId());
				c.createGroundItem(i.getItemId(), i.getItemX(), i.getItemY(), i.getItemAmount());
			}
			if(i.hideTicks == 0)
			{
				c.removeGroundItem(i.getItemX(), i.getItemY(), i.getItemId());
				c.createGroundItem(i.getItemId(), i.getItemX(), i.getItemY(), i.getItemAmount());
			}
		}
	}
}

public void reloadGroundItem(client c, GroundItem i)
{
	if(c != null)
	{
		if(c.distanceToPoint(i.getItemX(), i.getItemY()) <= 60)
		{
			if(c.playerId == i.getItemController() && i.hideTicks > 0)
			{
				c.removeGroundItem(i.getItemX(), i.getItemY(), i.getItemId());
				c.createGroundItem(i.getItemId(), i.getItemX(), i.getItemY(), i.getItemAmount());
			}
			if(i.hideTicks == 0)
			{
				c.removeGroundItem(i.getItemX(), i.getItemY(), i.getItemId());
				c.createGroundItem(i.getItemId(), i.getItemX(), i.getItemY(), i.getItemAmount());
			}
		}
	}
}	

public void process()
{
	for (int index = 0; index < 5000; index++)
	{
		if(items[index] == null)
			continue;
		GroundItem i = items[index];
		if(i.hideTicks > 0)
			i.hideTicks--;
		if(i.hideTicks == 1)
		{
			i.hideTicks = 0;
			createGlobalItem(i);
			i.removeTicks = HIDE_TICKS;
		}
		if(i.removeTicks > 0)
			i.removeTicks--;
		if(i.removeTicks == 1)
		{
			i.removeTicks = 0;
			removeGlobalItem(i, i.getItemId(), i.getItemX(), i.getItemY());
			break;
		}
	}
}

public void createGlobalItem(GroundItem i)
{
	for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
	{
		if(p == null)
			continue;
		client player = (client) p;
		if(player == null)
			continue;
		reloadGroundItem(player, i);
	}
}


public void removeGlobalItem(GroundItem i, int itemId, int itemX, int itemY)
{
	for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
	{
		if(p == null)
			continue;
		client player = (client) p;
		if(player == null)
			continue;
		if(player.distanceToPoint(i.getItemX(), i.getItemY()) <= 60)
		{
			player.removeGroundItem(i.getItemX(), i.getItemY(), i.getItemId());
			removeItem(i);
		}
	}
}

public void createGroundItem(client c, int itemId, int itemX, int itemY, int itemAmount, int playerToGive)
{
	if(itemId > 0 && itemAmount > 0)
	{
		client player = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerToGive];
		if(player == null)
			return;
		player.createGroundItem(itemId, itemX, itemY, itemAmount);
		GroundItem item = new GroundItem(itemId, itemX, itemY, itemAmount, playerToGive, HIDE_TICKS);
		addItem(item);

}
}

public void removeGroundItem(client c, int itemId, int itemX, int itemY, boolean addItems)
{
	for (int index = 0; index < 5000; index++)
	{
		if(items[index] == null)
			continue;
		GroundItem i = items[index];
		if(i.getItemId() == itemId && i.getItemX() == itemX && i.getItemY() == itemY)
		{
			if(i.hideTicks > 0 && i.getItemController() == c.playerId)
			{
				if(addItems)
				{
					if(c.addItem(i.getItemId(), i.getItemAmount()))
					{
						removeControllersItem(i, c, i.getItemId(), i.getItemX(), i.getItemY());
						break;
					}
				} else
				{
					removeControllersItem(i, c, i.getItemId(), i.getItemX(), i.getItemY());
					break;
				}
			} else
			{
				if(addItems)
				{
					if(c.addItem(i.getItemId(), i.getItemAmount()))
					{
						removeGlobalItem(i, i.getItemId(), i.getItemX(), i.getItemY());
						break;
					}
				} else
				{
					removeGlobalItem(i, i.getItemId(), i.getItemX(), i.getItemY());
					break;
				}[/code]

item.title: Droping -=HELP=-
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Add this method to ItemHandler.java

public static void addItem(int itemID, int itemX, int itemY, int itemAmount, int itemController, boolean itemStatic) { for (int i = 0; i <= 5000; i++) { if (globalItemID[i] == 0) { globalItemController[i] = itemController; globalItemID[i] = itemID; globalItemX[i] = itemX; globalItemY[i] = itemY; globalItemAmount[i] = itemAmount; globalItemStatic[i] = itemStatic; globalItemTicks[i] = 0; if ((globalItemController[i] != -1) && (globalItemController[i] != 0)) spawnItem(globalItemID[i], globalItemX[i], globalItemY[i], globalItemAmount[i], globalItemController[i]); break; } } }

Read full topic
